entry.title: Random order for clients page
entry.summary: In an email conversation between Amir Taaki and a Bitcoin Wiki editor on July 9, 2012, it was discussed whether or not to remove a page on the Wiki that listed multiple Bitcoin clients. The editor had suggested removing the page due to concerns about its usefulness and controversy surrounding some of the listed clients. However, Taaki argued that there was no reason to remove the page and emphasized the importance of bitcoin.org as a neutral resource for the community. He also recommended trying out new clients such as Electrum and MultiBit, which he claimed were more featureful and secure than Bitcoin-Qt, the reference client. The conversation also touched on the randomization of entries and the perceived lack of visitors to the Wiki. Overall, the discussion highlighted differing opinions on the role of the Bitcoin Wiki and the various clients available.
